whoweare.descrizione: We have been serving the citizens of Milano and the surrounding areas for over thirty years, and it is our privilege to provide quality care for you and your family. Our experienced, compassionate staff includes nurses, medical technologistst, x - ray technologists, and medical office assistants. Most major insurances are accepted.Your health and well - being are our top priority, and we look forward to serving you and having a most happy and healthy relationship.
